He is a most wicked urchin.

sentences.en: Her hands were small and brown, an urchin's hands.

sentences.en: Prise open the shell to sea urchins , sea urchin eggs is delicious.

sentences.en: Quiet ! Lord love you! Never heard noisier little urchin!
sentences.cn: 别吵了! 哎呀! 真没遇到比你更闹的小鬼.

sentences.en: The birthday cake all around with candles looks like an urchin!
sentences.cn: 浑身插满蜡烛的蛋糕活脱就是一只刺猬.

sentences.en: The spines of the omnivorous pencil-spined urchin extend outward from its body.
sentences.cn: 这个铅笔状的杂食性海胆的刺从它们的身体里伸出来。

sentences.en: There were crab, urchin, fish and Shrimps in the table.

sentences.en: You should sheer off the urchin.
